title: paavanathanaya paramaatma
sahitya:
pAvanatanaya paramAtmA
bhava bhaya haraNA paRRakrama guNa sIma

anupallavi

bhuvanAtrayamuna samAna rahita
avanijA ramaNa hrudayAmbhujasthita

caraNam

madilO niNDina mangaLamUrti
AdivyAdihara shrI shubhAkara mAruti
kshitijA ramaNa shrI rAmadhyAnamE
ati sulabham bahudAri yanitelpumA
